text: The Imam Mosa Al Kadhim Grand Mosque is a grand mosque located in the city of Basra, Iraq. Following partial destruction, in 2012 reconstruction of the mosque commenced. The mosque is located near the city of Mishraq and near Hayaniya. ==See also== * Islam in Iraq * List of mosques in Iraq ==References== Category:Mosques in Iraq Category:Buildings and structures in Basra
title: Imam Mosa Al Kadhim Grand Mosque
